attributes.action: to make LAW the  PROVISION of DISABILITY PARKING   in High Streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To record on the  PCN details of  the  Blue Badge displayed on windscreen . I find that TRAFFIC WARDENS are told to  deliberately ignore Blue Badges displayed NOT RECORDING ON the PCN  causing severe stress,  with Councillors & MPs complying with  no signage to be clearly  seen .

I am DYSPRAXIC . Are dyspraxics not allowed to do e petion is assistance not given ? THIS IS NOT DEMOCRATIC as you obviously hate disabled people.
